mapper.select: SELECT a.order_no,a.cp_code,d.prt_code FROM orders a JOIN order_Inf b ON (b.order_no = a.order_no) JOIN company c ON (c.cp_code = a.cp_code) JOIN product d ON (b.prt_code = d.prt_code)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_inf (pre_no, order_qty, order_out_qty, order_no, prt_code, unit_price, order_price ) VALUES (#{preNo}, #{orderQty}, #{orderOutQty}, #{orderNo}, #{prtCode}, #{unitPrice}, #{orderPrice})
mapper.select: select ORDER_NO, D_DAY, ORDER_PRG, ORDER_DATE, CP_CODE, ORDER_YN from orders where order_no=#{orderNo}
